sentences.en: A cable or rope used in mooring or towing a ship.
sentences.cn: 一种用于停泊的绳索;从浮标伸向停泊点的抛锚处.

sentences.en: A heavy rope or chain for mooring or anchoring a ship.
sentences.cn: 通过缆柱头使得船渐渐停在停泊处的针.

sentences.en: Adjusting safety device for hydraulic system of steering gear ( windlass 、 mooring winch ).
sentences.cn: 舵机 ( 锚机、绞缆机 ) 液压系统安全装置调整.

sentences.en: As shown, the valve seals completely around the 3 - inch mooring cable.
sentences.cn: 正如所示, 阀门环绕3英寸的锚缆索并实现完全的密封.

sentences.en: As the mooring progressed, the weather deteriorated more and more.
sentences.cn: 天亮越来越迟, 天气越来越坏.

sentences.en: Bulwark plates in way of mooring fittings to be increased and reinforced.
sentences.cn: 舷墙外板在系泊设备处需要加强和加固.

sentences.en: He cut the engine and grabbed the mooring lines.
sentences.cn: 他关掉发动机，抓住系船的绳子。

sentences.en: Her mind was shaken loose from the little mooring of logic that it had.
sentences.cn: 就像小船失去了锚,她的思绪毫无逻辑地四处漂浮,一会为这个想法难受,一会为那个念头生气.

sentences.en: However , all the best mooring were occupied by local fishing boats.
sentences.cn: 凡是可以泊船的地方早已被当地渔船占去了.

sentences.en: Inland navigation vessels - Anchoring, coupling, towing, hauling and mooring systems.
sentences.cn: 内河航运船舶.抛锚, 耦合, 拖曳, 牵引和停泊系统.

sentences.en: Mooring test ( sea trial ) of M. E . and inspection attached pumps and piping system.
sentences.cn: 主机系泊 ( 航行 ) 试验并检查其附属泵与管路.

sentences.en: Nicholas untied the boat from her mooring.
sentences.cn: 尼古拉斯把泊船的绳缆解开。

sentences.en: Put the rat guards on all the mooring ropes.
sentences.cn: 水手长,在所有的系缆绳上放置夹鼠板.

sentences.en: The main engine must undergo both mooring and sea trials.
sentences.cn: 主机必须经过系泊试验和航行试验.

sentences.en: The sinker form also influences the mooring line force.
sentences.cn: 配重形式对锚绳力的大小亦产生一定的影响.

trans.tran_cn: 停泊处，系泊用具，系船具，下锚
trans.tran_en: the ropes, chains,  anchor s  etc used to fasten a ship or boat to the land or the bottom of the sea

trans.tran_cn: 停泊，系泊（船只）(moor的现在分词)
